subject: Ryder Cup (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Sergio Garcia took the golf world by storm when he broke onto the scene in the late 1990s. Little has happened since. But the Ryder Cup has him positioned finally to show off his game.
snippet: Sergio Garcia took the golf world by storm when he broke onto the scene in the late 1990s. Little has happened since. But the Ryder Cup has him positioned finally to show off his game.
